website_summaries.verdict: With a real glass globe and cast metal base, this quality machine is modeled after vintage tabletop gumball machines.
pros: Dispenses up to 600 traditional gumballs as well as nuts or candy with the same dimensions or smaller
Accepts any coins and doubles as a bank
Assembly is straightforward and doesn’t require many tools
cons: It may have difficulty dispensing gumballs that are not perfectly round

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and nostalgic!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Don’t over tighten & you won’t gave to worry about the glass globe getting cracked or broken. SO much fun for kids (keep it out of reach of little ones, though). Great way to save their change!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should.
customer_reviews.text: Giving it four stars just because sometimes you have to wiggle and jiggle the lever a little bit for the coin to sink down and deliver your gum ball. But it’s great quality. Glass and metal. Takes any size coin quarters or smaller. My son loves it. It does the trick. It’s exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: L.G.B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. You will need two bags of Gumballs ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. You will need two bags of Gumballs to fill top globe. You also really need to put a coin - a penny will even work - to receive a gumball. I am so happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Coin collector got stuck!
customer_reviews.text: stopped working an hour after my kids got it- Knob stopped turning. not all metal. Some plastic parts!
customer_reviews.author: Shonda

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work long
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for a week and then it quit working all together.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Works as described, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little gum ball machine and I’m excited to use it in my classroom. I have used it for months at home and have encouraged others to use it to see if it will hold up and so far I have not had anything to be disappointed about. I love this little cutie!
customer_reviews.author: Emily’s mom

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected an acrylic "sturdy" machine - it has real glass and steel - great and fun way for the kiddos to save some change - I love that it takes all change. I wish it had come with a small bag of gumballs, but I had planned for it and had bought a big box of them.
customer_reviews.author: PA Dutch Girl

customer_reviews.title: Bubble gum machine
customer_reviews.text: It was a great Chris gift for my 9 year old son. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Riley

customer_reviews.title: ... read u thought it came with stand so was disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was ok for price I guess I didn’t read u thought it came with stand so was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the smaller gumball machine. The product has been great thus far. It is pretty solid, with the exception of the bottom. It is a hard plastic plate. I was disappointed and anticipated it would have been a metal plate. With that aside, it is easy to take apart and clean. Be sure you don't over tighten the screw to hold the lid in place or you may break the bowl. It held 4 bags of M&Ms and had a little more room. Overall a great find for the price.
customer_reviews.author: S Family

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea of using seasonal decorations to liven up ...
customer_reviews.text: I am excited that my gum ball machine has arrived, I love the idea of using seasonal decorations to liven up my apartment
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT bubble gum machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT bubble gum machine for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: nnps

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 8yr old! Sturdy, good price, fast shipping!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! My niece loved this as a Christmas present... Except we used M&M's instead of gumballs. Any coin works well, and it is easy to extract the money underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Gumball Machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought the gumball machine for my classroom. After one week it broke down. I can't turn the crank with or without coins. When a penny is inserted it jams. I've searched without success for the receipt to return it. Now I see that it's too late to return it anyway. I'm not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great vintage look & works like new with coin or no coin option!
customer_reviews.author: Logan & Aiden's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Just like the candy store
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the gum ball machine. Just what my nephew wanted. He has been saving his coins and using it with the gumballs my brother purchased for it. Quick delivery, good product. WOuld order again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Weller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice product of excellent quality. My grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.author: mommer

customer_reviews.title: Never worked right.
customer_reviews.text: We never got any use out of this. The coins always jammed up and had to take it a part to get them out. Cheap plastic gears. Fell off the dresser and my wife just chucked it. My daughter didn't seemed to much bothered by it.
customer_reviews.author: Nik Lance

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking machine though
customer_reviews.text: Received this product and the globe was broken on it!! Hoping for a replacement, this was for my sons birthday and he was devistated when he seen it and was unable to use it! Very nice looking machine though!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: GOOD!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product! I would give it a an "A" ! I love it !I would recommend it to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Glass broke before first use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my 10 year old daughter for Christmas. She opened it Christmas morning and took the top off very carefully and started to pour the gumballs in and the glass globe broke. The glass is paper thin! Wouldn't buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: hill mama

customer_reviews.title: Fun addition to the office!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun piece to add to the office. I work at a university. Students and faculty come in and seem immediately at ease. It always sparks a smile and conversation. I've made lots of new friends by having this in my office!
customer_reviews.author: KYGirl40391

customer_reviews.title: Gummy gums
customer_reviews.text: This household loves gum. This makes it extra fun. I filled it with the Rain-blo gum bought on Amazon also
customer_reviews.author: Dianep

customer_reviews.title: Solid Build High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very study. High quality materials all around. I was very surprised by the build quality and everything. Out of the box it functions properly and the mechanism is clean and it just works. We bought this for our son who loves coin-op machines so he could have one at home to play around with. He loves it - asks for GUM MACHINE.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fill with personalized m&m's I bought for a party. Worked out great. Not sure how much I will use it on a regular basis. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: j costello

customer_reviews.title: Extremely breakable and not at all good for children
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gumball machine for my 5 year old for Christmas because it was highly reviewed and would take almost any kind of coin. I picked the gumball machine up to set it on the shelf. When I did so, the globe shattered. I can't believe this machine was so cheap and my poor kid was completely destroyed that her big Christmas present shattered for no reason. I think the company should reconsider carrying such a cheap (and dangerous, really) item.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Setting it to the "no pay" option was a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Setting it to the "no pay" option was a bit trickier than I expected but not a huge deal. Also, the receptacle where the candy comes out is really small and cumbersome for adult fingers. However, the dimensions are provided so that is on me. It's a big hit at my office. In time I may upgrade to a larger size and I will order from this company.
customer_reviews.author: shari g

customer_reviews.title: Great Gumball Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gumball machine. My only complaint is that I put PB M&Ms in it and the grinder has crushed a few of them. It's meant for gumballs, so that's not a surprise. I wish it dispensed a few more than 3 each time you put money in it though. It's seems sturdy enough and adds a fun touch.
customer_reviews.author: SuperDaysh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish it would dispense more than 1 gum ball at a time
customer_reviews.author: Linda Seigfreid

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is going to love it for her birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This mini Candy Gumball Machine Bank is a handy item to own. It allows my kids to save money and get candy
customer_reviews.author: Therander L. Tarleton

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Coin intake jams. Very disappointed! Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: just quarters please
customer_reviews.text: Is very nice, and stiff. Gets stuck if you try to not to use quarters. It can be used also for jelly beans, m&m etc.. It was worth it
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Pennies jammed
customer_reviews.text: Pennies get jammed frequently and frustrating for kids. Poor product design.
customer_reviews.author: DEP

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap. Not cast iron.  It is pot metal.  Not very heavy and tips over when filled
customer_reviews.text: The surprise was ruined when it arrived without packaging. This WAS going to be a Valentines Day present and that was ruined. Amazon could of at least put it in a shipping box to protect it. It's misleading when it says cast metal. It's a cheap cheap blend of light weight pot metal.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy3929

customer_reviews.title: My child loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent candy machine. Only flaw is if You tip it upsidedown (i have a 2 year old), the candy falls into the dispenser tray.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Robb

customer_reviews.title: Neat
customer_reviews.text: We received the gumball machine and it is neat! Just like the one we had which fell and broke. We also received it in a short amount of time. I appreciate this purchase because the grandchildren love it.
customer_reviews.author: Russell W. Barrett

product_meta.title: Great Northern Popcorn Company Old Fashioned Vintage Candy Gumball Machine Bank, 11-Inch
product_meta.description: If you are in the market for an antique gumball machine, stop looking! The Great Northern Gumball Machine and Bank brings back memories of an old fashion candy shop with the penny gumball machine. This exquisite replica from the 1920's is constructed of premium quality components and is guaranteed authentic by Great Northern--Don't settle for cheap imitations! The Great Northern Gumball Machine will enhance any decor and is certain to be a conversation piece for years to come. It is perfect for businesses, dorm rooms, kid's rooms, and it completes your game room / home theater. The base is constructed of a heavy-duty cast metal base and the globe is made of real glass--not cheap plastic. The heavy duty construction provides added stability and feel and prevents the machine from tipping over like some of the inferior units sold in the marketplace. Great Northern has incorporated an innovative dispensing mechanism which is fully adjustable so you can vary the amount of candy/gum that is dispensed when you turn the handle. In addition, there is a unique anti-spill cover which will keep your candy/gum in the tray and not on the floor. The machine also operates as a bank and has proven to be an effective tool for teaching kids how to save money. Features / Specifications: Real glass gumball machine globe - not cheap plastic, Premium Construction. Cast metal gumball machine base, lid, and coin mechanism, Accepts any coins (quarters, dimes, nickels, pennies), Includes instructions for "free spin" to work without coins, Works as a gumball bank - retrieve coins when full, Anti-spill gumball dispenser with door cover, Dispenses small gumballs (.62" or smaller), candy, or nuts, Gumball capacity: 2 lbs. of .62" gumballs, Dispenses Gumballs, Peanuts, Jellybeans & More, Choking Hazard - Not for children under 3 years, Color: Classic red finish, Weight: 2.5 lbs., Machine Only Dimensions: 11"H x 5"W, Full 1 Year Warranty!
feature_bullets: Real glass gumball machine globe - not cheap plastic
Premium Construction; Cast metal gumball machine base; lid; and coin mechanism
Accepts any coins (quarters; dimes; nickels; pennies)
Works as a gumball bank - retrieve coins when full
Dispenses small gumballs (.62" or smaller); candy; or nuts
